verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Abba (echo) Abba Father You are the Potter We are the clay The work of Your hands.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Mold us (echo) Mold us and fashion us Into the image of Jesus Jesus Your Son, of Jesus Your Son{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Father (echo) Father may we be one in You May we be one in You As He is in You And You are in Him{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Glory (echo) Glory and praise to You Glory and praise to You Forever Amen Forever Amen.{/lang-eng}
